p: Adverse events data were shown in Table S4. In aCRCS A1 + B1, the incidence of grade 3 or higher adverse events of leucopenia, anemia, febrile neutropenia, and thromboembolism was significantly higher in the IRI group than in the OX group. Grade 3 or higher peripheral sensory neuropathy was only observed in the OX group in all aCRCS subtypes.
